title: Riot please answer this question
body: When i can join the pbe ?? i pressed ''i want to be a tester'' years ago but i didnt get an account for pbe ... Please answer this riot or someone else.

replies.body: I do see that you've applied to the PBE, but there's no way for us to expedite or force an application through.  I don't have details on how applicants are slected beyond our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Best of luck with admissions into the PBE!
Can you write this with a simple language im a turkish person and i cant know this....
